QuestData.Title: From Within
QuestData.Description:
Our demon hunters, Kor'vas Bloodthorn and Cyana Nightglaive took a small force of the Illidari across to Faronaar. Their mission was to weaken the Legion from within.
I haven't heard from them in a while.
It would be best if you could find and lead them to success. Agreed?
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Kor'vas Bloodthorn on Faronaar at Vanquish Point.
